problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = N_0, CD ⊥ AB at D, CD = N_1, BC = N_2, then AC = ()
raw_answer: 解:∠ACB=90°,CD⊥AB于D,CD=4,BC=5,由勾股定理得:BD=√{BC²-CD²}=√{5²-4²}=3,∵∠ACB=90°,CD⊥AB于D,∴∠B=90°-∠BCD=∠ACD,∠BDC=∠ADC,∴△BDC∽△CDA,∴\frac{BC}{AC}=\frac{BD}{CD},即\frac{5}{AC}=\frac{3}{4},解得:AC=\frac{20}{3},故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了勾股定理,相似三角形的判定和性质,熟练掌握相似三角形的判定和性质是解题的关键．
